name: TheGroomsmen
description: This is my official invitation to my groomsmen. Play it in the browser, you'll need to use w, a, s, d, space, and the mouse. Send the link to anyone that you want to show. Thanks for playing! Also yes, all the art (and menu song) is cringe worthy since I made it, and I'm definitely NOT an artist. Hope you like the gameplay though! Just click help in game if you get confused on how to play.
